title: I know a lot of people are still mad at Riot, but we can all agree there are worse issues

replies.body: It's not that I decorate early, I just haven't taken it down from 2013.

It's not that I don't decorate early. It's that I never put it up in the first place.

HOLIDAY REBEL, ACTIVATED.
INB4 Fox news "War on Christmas"

"INB4" = in before?

sorry
Yeah. It's used to refer to something that people think will happen in the future, usually sarcastically or humorously.
thanks bro!

Before I saw the words "Christmas Decorating!" I thought it would say "Premature ejaculation." Well folks. That's all she wrote.
Im dying XD

sorry wrong forum, in this forum we dont decorate for XMAS, we have a snowdown shop tough

enjoy buying

...im that person who will be singing Christmas songs all through out the year but when Christmas comes along I don't sing any.
No legit.
When someone says hi to me I say "Merry Christmas" ;/
Hi

someone downvoted this guy just for saying hi?

welp, monkey see monkey do

sorry bill, but i am downvoting you also but only because im curious as to how far down people can vote someone just for simply saying "Hi"

( i am very sorry, i know these points can be expensive but its for the good of social entertainment and sheer boredom, your sacrifice, though not a choice, is to be commended and remembered throughout history for as long my short-term memory )
Appreciate it

Lmao
Merry Christmas to you :3

I'd like to stop by and say this is how a meme is done appropriately, well done OP for not just insulting a group of people or framing it like a legitimate topic.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
This is something I could get behind.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fieTEl42,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-08T23:00:14.349+0000)
>
> This is something I could get behind.

Stopping premature Christmas decorating or premature ejaculation?
The first. I hate seeing Christmas decorations in November.

Christmas in July is really annoying.

It's even worse cause where i live we have a Christmas Tree Shop. They have Christmas decorations up 24/7.
How is it open 24/7?
If it isn't, imagine the horror of having to take down all of the Christmas decorations every time you close the shop, and having to put them all back up every time you open.
Ok, how is it open for most of the year?

Christmas Tree Shop is actually a chain that has a lot of bargain priced stuff, not just Christmas stuff.

But there is a store not far from me that actually is Christmas stuff only, and it's open all year round.  But it's not a chain or anything.  It must make some money, since it's been in business for years and years.

sounds like a front to me

-hey johnny

-yeah joe

-how we gonna claim all this drug and prostitution money on our taxes?

-we'll open a shop, it'll be our front

-what kind of shop?

-well it's gotta be something everyone loves so it seems like a normal store

-christmas johnny, everyone love christmas

-joe, you sir are a freakin genius

-I know right? clearly nobody else has had this genius idea before or these shops would be everywhere like mcdonalds

-yup

okay so i've played this scenario over in my head a whole one time and this is how it went down 100% of the time, so clearly, this xmas shop 24/7 stuff is a front.

want a christmas tree? we might be able to help
want some "other" trees? we got quite the selection

November? My first year living in Florida they put that shit up in the middle of October. No Halloween anywhere, but 87 degrees and I'm looking at Santa hanging off a palm tree. 

I get it in Michigan where maybe they're trying to beat the weather, but here...WHY?
Yes.

Trust me, it could still be worse:

http://www.bipamerica.com/bipnews/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Hillary-Clinton-vs-Donald-Trump.jpg

These two could be competing to lead your country X(
But how am I supposed to get ready for my Christmas in July party?
this is attack on christmas https://superhappyawesome.files.wordpress.com/2013/12/attack-on-titan-christmas-3.jpg

How exactly this is sarcasm, this is the bigger issue.
ew i know right? its so...tacky why do people do it?
#\#firstworldproblems

Well, speaking as an Ex-Dollar General employee, I can say that we weren't allowed to keep things in the back room, everything had to be shelved. It caused problems when christmas things came in the truck with our 4th of July things.
Riot celebrates Christmas? That's news to me.
... Why?
